description: black cover with faux red wood strip pattern down L; horizontal magenta bar across C with title; simple, stylized image of male figure at top and female figure at bottom in circles; black and white stylized, simplistic drawings inside with nude figures, abstract images, cut-out cards, text; lender's archive #16
image_copyright: © David Shrigley %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F DACS%2C UK
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed:
Signed in pencil on title page: DAVID SHRIGLEY
Signed and dated in blue ink on title page: DS 98
title: Why We Got the Sack from the Museum
